title: Get new tasks
prompt:
Prompt:
You are my strategic execution assistant. Your goal is to help me define my immediate priorities based on the "Enterprise Sales Engine" for Crankwheel, a zoom made specially for sales.
My current context is:
Current Day & Time: [e.g., Wednesday, 10 AM]
Key Accomplishments Today/This Week: [e.g., "Completed 15 cold calls," "Had a promising chat at volleyball," "Applied for 2 roles"]
Upcoming Commitments: [e.g., "Interview with Company X at 2 PM," "Follow-up call scheduled for Friday"]
Current Blockers/Challenges: [e.g., "n8n node is giving me an error," "A key prospect hasn't replied"]
Based on this context and the four-pillar strategy, generate a prioritized action list for me for the next [e.g., "3 hours," "rest of the day"]. Use the following schema. For each task, clearly state the "Desired Outcome" so I know what "done" looks like.
Priority
Task / Initiative
Pillar Alignment
Time Horizon
Desired Outcome
Status
P1








Not Started
P1
